mod.name: The Extravagant
mod.credits: Smonko for Extravagant Beta Art. Mrs. Dingsda for Dig up Junk and Meditation Card Art. Grimm for the many ideas. Kiooeht for giving permission to steal an important Patch. Other art Credits: lobbien
mod.description: A Character mostly centered around synergy and strong card control.

cards.name: Acceleration
cards.description:
Retain.
Gain [E].
Exhaust.

cards.name: Acceleration+
cards.description:
Retain.
Gain [E] [E].
Exhaust.

cards.name: Accumulation
cards.description:
Retain.
Draw 2 cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Accumulation+
cards.description:
Retain.
Draw 3 cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Invocation
cards.description:
Retain.
Fetch 1 card from your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Invocation+
cards.description:
Retain.
Fetch 2 cards from your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Preservation
cards.description:
Retain.
Retain 1 card this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Preservation+
cards.description:
Retain.
Retain 2 cards this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Clairvoyance
cards.description:
Draw 1 card.
Discard any number of cards from your draw pile.

cards.name: Clairvoyance+
cards.description:
Draw 2 cards.
Discard any number of cards from your draw pile.

cards.name: Fence
cards.description:
Gain 4 Block.
Next turn gain !theextravagant:REDUCED_BLOCK! Block.
theextravagant:Basic_Defend.

cards.name: Fence+
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block.
Next turn gain !theextravagant:REDUCED_BLOCK! Block.
theextravagant:Basic_Defend.

cards.name: Jump Cut
cards.description: Deal 3 damage. For the next 2 buffs you gain, trigger its effects that happen at the start of your turn.

cards.name: Jump Cut+
cards.description: Deal 5 damage. For the next 3 buffs you gain, trigger its effects that happen at the start of your turn.

cards.name: Sly Strike
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage.
Gain 1 Strength.
Lose 1 Strength at the end of your turn.
theextravagant:Basic_Strike.

cards.name: Sly Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Gain 2 Strength.
Lose 2 Strength at the end of your turn.
theextravagant:Basic_Strike.

cards.name: Triumph
cards.description:
Whenever you play 2 attacks in a row this turn, gain 1 Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Triumph+
cards.description:
Whenever you play 2 attacks in a row this turn, gain 2 Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Aggression
cards.description: Deal 4 damage. Double this cards damage this turn.

cards.name: Aggression+
cards.description: Deal 5 damage. Double this cards damage this turn.

cards.name: Cutthroat
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Deals triple damage if you played no cards this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Cutthroat+
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Deals triple damage if you played no cards this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Cutting Edge
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage. Apply 2 Vulnerable.
Exhaust the top card of your draw pile.

cards.name: Cutting Edge+
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage. Apply 3 Vulnerable.
Exhaust the top card of your draw pile.

cards.name: Flashback
cards.description: Put the next 2 cards you play on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Flashback+
cards.description: Put the next 3 cards you play on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Focus Stab
cards.description: Deal 12 damage. Deals double damage if this costs 0.

cards.name: Focus Stab+
cards.description: Deal 14 damage. Deals double damage if this costs 0.

cards.name: Garbage Cannon
cards.description:
Draw 3 cards.
Exhaust each Status card drawn.
Deal 5 damage for each card Exhausted.

cards.name: Garbage Cannon+
cards.description:
Draw 3 cards.
Exhaust each Status card drawn.
Deal 7 damage for each card Exhausted.

cards.name: Iron Plumes
cards.description:
Gain 3 Temporary_HP.
Whenever this card is drawn, increase the amount by 3 this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Iron Plumes+
cards.description:
Gain 5 Temporary_HP.
Whenever this card is drawn, increase the amount by 3 this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Persistence
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage. Gain 3 Strength. Lose 3 Strength at the end of your turn.
Add a Persistence into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Persistence+
cards.description:
Deal 14 damage. Gain 4 Strength. Lose 4 Strength at the end of your turn.
Add a Persistence+ into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: PuffUp
cards.description:
Gain 3 Temporary_HP.
Gain 3 Strength, lose 3 Strength at the end of your turn.

cards.name: PuffUp+
cards.description:
Gain 4 Temporary_HP.
Gain 4 Strength, lose 4 Strength at the end of your turn.

cards.name: Reconsider
cards.description:
Discard 1 card. If you discard an attack gain Strength equal to it's [E] cost.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Reconsider+
cards.description:
Discard 2 cards. If you discard an attack gain Strength equal to it's [E] cost.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Riot
cards.description:
When drawn discard 3 cards.
Deal 16 damage.
Apply 2 Vulnerable.
 Next turn, gain [E].

cards.name: Riot+
cards.description:
When drawn discard 3 cards.
Deal 20 damage.
Apply 2 Vulnerable.
 Next turn, gain [E].

cards.name: Rusty Buckler
cards.description:
Unplayable.
At the end of this turn, gain 2 Thorns and 2 Block.
If you played a card that costs 2 or more this turn, Retain this card.

cards.name: Rusty Buckler+
cards.description:
Unplayable.
At the end of this turn, gain 2 Thorns and 4 Block.
If you played a card that costs 2 or more this turn, Retain this card.

cards.name: Sharp Talons
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
If the target is Vulnerable, increase the damage of a random attack in your hand by 2.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sharp Talons+
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
If the target is Vulnerable, increase the damage of a random attack in your hand by 3.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Spark
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Unplayable.
When drawn increase the damage and Block of all cards in your hand by 1 this combat.

cards.name: Spark+
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Unplayable.
When drawn or discarded from your hand, increase the damage and Block of all cards in your hand by 1 this combat.

cards.name: Spontaneous Strike
cards.description: Deal 12 damage. When drawn, this card costs 3 this turn.

cards.name: Spontaneous Strike+
cards.description: Deal 15 damage. When drawn, this card costs 3 this turn.

cards.name: Step Back
cards.description: Gain 7 Block. Put 1 card from your hand on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Step Back+
cards.description: Gain 10 Block. Put 1 card from your hand on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Swift Switch
cards.description: Draw 2 cards. Put 1 card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Swift Switch+
cards.description: Draw 2 cards. Put 1 card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile. It costs 0 [E] until played.

cards.name: Twitch
cards.description:
Unplayable.
When drawn,
gain [E] [E] and discard a random card from  your hand.

cards.name: Twitch+
cards.description:
Unplayable.
When drawn,
gain [E] [E] and discard a card from  your hand.

cards.name: Ambush
cards.description:
If the last card you play during your turn is a skill, the next card you play deals double damage.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Ambush+
cards.description: If the last card you play during your turn is a skill, the next card you play deals double damage.

cards.name: Button up
cards.description:
Unplayable.
While this card is in your draw pile, gain 3 Block at the start of your turn.

cards.name: Button up+
cards.description:
Unplayable.
While this card is in your draw pile, gain 4 Block at the start of your turn.

cards.name: Channel
cards.description:
Retain all 2 [E] cost cards at the end of this turn.
They cost 0 [E] next turn.

cards.name: Channel+
cards.description:
Retain all 2 [E] cost cards at the end of this turn.
They cost 0 [E] next turn.

cards.name: Courage
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
Gain 12 Block.
While this is in your hand, all other cards in your hand are Unplayable.

cards.name: Courage+
cards.description:
Deal 15 damage.
Gain 15 Block.
While this is in your hand, all other cards in your hand are Unplayable.

cards.name: Dig up Junk
cards.description: Put 3 random 0 [E] cost cards from your draw pile into your hand.

cards.name: Dig up Junk+
cards.description: Put 4 random 0 [E] cost cards from your draw pile into your hand.

cards.name: Drift
cards.description: Deal 4 damage 2 times. Draw 3 cards, discard 3 cards.

cards.name: Drift+
cards.description: Deal 5 damage 2 times. Draw 4 cards, discard 4 cards.

cards.name: Dual Mirror Cut
cards.description:
Discard a card. If you discard an attack, deal its damage to a random enemy 2 times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Dual Mirror Cut+
cards.description:
Discard a card. If you discard an attack, deal its damage to a random enemy 3 times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Firework
cards.description:
Discard a card.
Deal 4 damage for each [E] it costs.

cards.name: Firework+
cards.description:
Discard a card.
Deal 5 damage for each [E] it costs.

cards.name: Foil
cards.description:
Whenever you play a card this turn, gain 3 Temporary_HP and reduce its damage and Block by 2.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Foil+
cards.description:
Whenever you play a card this turn, gain 3 Temporary_HP and reduce its damage and Block by 2.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Glamour
cards.description:
Gain [SE] [SE]  .
Becomes Unplayable until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Glamour+
cards.description:
Gain [SE] [SE] [SE]  .
Becomes Unplayable until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Glyph of Choice
cards.description: At the start of each turn lose [SE] and add an theextravagant:Accumulation into your hand.

cards.name: Glyph of Choice+
cards.description:
Innate.
At the start of each turn lose [SE] and add an theextravagant:Accumulation into your hand.

cards.name: Glyph of Power
cards.description: At the start of each turn lose [SE] and add an theextravagant:Acceleration into your hand.

cards.name: Glyph of Power+
cards.description:
Innate.
At the start of each turn lose [SE] and add an theextravagant:Acceleration into your hand.

cards.name: Glyph of Sight
cards.description: At the start of each turn lose [SE] and add an theextravagant:Invocation into your hand.

cards.name: Glyph of Sight+
cards.description:
Innate.
At the start of each turn lose [SE] and add an theextravagant:Invocation into your hand..

cards.name: Glyph of Time
cards.description: At the start of each turn lose [SE] and add an theextravagant:Preservation into your hand.

cards.name: Glyph of Time+
cards.description:
Innate.
At the start of each turn lose [SE] and add an theextravagant:Preservation into your hand.

cards.name: Gust of Wind
cards.description:
Deal 0 damage 6 times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Gust of Wind+
cards.description:
Deal 0 damage 8 times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Impulse
cards.description: Whenever you play a card that costs 2 or more [E] this turn, gain [E] next turn.

cards.name: Impulse+
cards.description: Whenever you play a card that costs 2 or more [E] this turn, gain [E] [E] next turn.

cards.name: Overrun
cards.description: Whenever you gain Block this turn, deal 4 damage to all enemies.

cards.name: Overrun+
cards.description: Whenever you gain Block this turn, deal 6 damage to all enemies.

cards.name: Pluck
cards.description: Draw 2 cards. They cost 0 [E] and Exhaust when played.

cards.name: Pluck+
cards.description: Draw 2 cards. They cost 0 [E] and Exhaust when played.

cards.name: Precaution
cards.description:
Gain 3 Block.
Gain 3 Block next turn.
Put 2 cards from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Precaution+
cards.description:
Gain 4 Block.
Gain 4 Block next turn.
Put 3 cards from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Radiance
cards.description: Whenever you play a power, a random enemy loses 1 Strength and add 1 Dazed on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Radiance+
cards.description:
Innate.
Whenever you play a power, a random enemy loses 1 Strength and add 1 Dazed on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Re-Seek
cards.description: Fetch 2 cards from your discard pile.

cards.name: Re-Seek+
cards.description: Fetch 3 cards from your discard pile.

cards.name: Retreat
cards.description: At the end of this turn put all cards in your hand into your draw pile and gain 4 Block for each.

cards.name: Retreat+
cards.description: At the end of this turn put all cards in your hand into your draw pile and gain 6 Block for each.

cards.name: Rising Phoenix
cards.description:
Costs 1 [E] less for every card Exhausted last turn.
Deal 4 damage 4 times to all enemies.

cards.name: Rising Phoenix+
cards.description:
Costs 1 [E] less for every card Exhausted last turn.
Deal 4 damage 6 times to all enemies.

cards.name: Shine
cards.description:
If the top card of your draw pile is Unplayable, gain 1 Dexterity and draw 1 card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Shine+
cards.description:
If the top card of your draw pile is Unplayable, gain 1 Dexterity and draw 2 cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Skillfull Dodge
cards.description: Gain 2 Block 2 times.

cards.name: Skillfull Dodge+
cards.description: Gain 2 Block 3 times.

cards.name: Strafe
cards.description: Gain 3 Block for each skill in your hand that costs 0 [E].

cards.name: Strafe+
cards.description: Gain 4 Block for each skill in your hand that costs 0 [E].

cards.name: Swirl
cards.description:
Fetch a card from your draw pile and increase its Block by 2 this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Swirl+
cards.description:
Fetch a card from your draw pile and increase its Block by 3 this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Thrill
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage to a random enemy 4 times.
Duplicate ALL attacks in your hand.

cards.name: Thrill+
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage to a random enemy 5 times.
Duplicate ALL attacks in your hand.

cards.name: Tools of Trickery
cards.description: At the start of each turn, discard a random card and Fetch a card from your draw pile.

cards.name: Tools of Trickery+
cards.description: At the start of each turn, discard a random card and Fetch a card from your draw pile.

cards.name: Twostep
cards.description: Draw 2 cards. Next turn draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Twostep+
cards.description: Draw 3 cards. Next turn draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Vintage
cards.description: At the start of your turn, shuffle up to 2 cards from your hand into your draw pile and gain [SE] for each.

cards.name: Vintage+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, shuffle up to 2 cards from your hand into your draw pile and gain [SE] for each.

cards.name: Zero Hero
cards.description: Gain 8 Block. If the next card you play costs 0 [E]  , play it 3 times.

cards.name: Zero Hero+
cards.description: Gain 10 Block. If the next card you play costs 0 [E]  , play it 3 times.

cards.name: 16 Tons
cards.description:
Ethereal.
When this card is discarded from your hand, exhaust it and deal 16 damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: 16 Tons+
cards.description:
Ethereal.
When this card is discarded from your hand, exhaust it and deal 16 damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Aftermath
cards.description:
Unplayable.
If this is the only card left in your hand at the end of your turn, deal 25 damage to all enemies.

cards.name: Aftermath+
cards.description:
Unplayable.
If this is the only card left in your hand at the end of your turn, deal 32 damage to all enemies.

cards.name: Antiquity
cards.description: At the start of your turn play any number of cards from your hand twice and draw 1 less card for each next turn.

cards.name: Antiquity+
cards.description: At the start of your turn play any number of cards from your hand twice and draw 1 less card for each next turn.

cards.name: Aurora Form
cards.description: Whenever a card is Exhausted, gain Temporary_HP equal to 3 times its [E] cost.

cards.name: Aurora Form+
cards.description: Whenever a card is Exhausted, gain Temporary_HP equal to 4 times its [E] cost.

cards.name: Damnation
cards.description: Whenever you play 3 cards that cost 2 [E] in a row deal 40 damage to all enemies.

cards.name: Damnation+
cards.description: Whenever you play 3 cards that cost 2 [E] in a row deal 50 damage to all enemies.

cards.name: Manifest Illusion
cards.description: Add 2 copies of a card in your hand into your hand. They cost 0 [E] until played. Shuffle 2 Dazed into your draw pile.

cards.name: Manifest Illusion+
cards.description: Add 2 copies of a card in your hand into your hand. They cost 0 [E] until played. Shuffle 2 Dazed into your draw pile.

cards.name: Ominous Glare
cards.description: Gain 8 Block. Add a copy of each card in your hand on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Ominous Glare+
cards.description: Gain 12 Block. Add a copy of each card in your hand on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Outrun
cards.description:
Discard all Skills.
Gain 1 Dexterity for each skill discarded.
At the end of this turn lose 2 Dexterity.

cards.name: Outrun+
cards.description:
Discard all Skills.
Gain 1 Dexterity for each skill discarded.
At the end of this turn lose 1 Dexterity.

cards.name: Overpower
cards.description:
Can only be played if you played a power this turn. Double the damage of ALL attacks in your hand for this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Overpower+
cards.description:
Can only be played if you played a power this turn. Double the damage of ALL attacks in your hand for this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Rapid Pulse
cards.description:
At the start of your turn gain 1 Strength.
At the end of your turn Exhaust the top card of your draw pile.

cards.name: Rapid Pulse+
cards.description:
At the start of your turn gain 1 Strength.
At the end of your turn Exhaust the top card of your draw pile.

cards.name: Redemption
cards.description: Deal 5 damage to all enemies for each Unplayable card in your draw pile. Put all Unplayable cards from your draw pile into your discard pile.

cards.name: Redemption+
cards.description: Deal 7 damage to all enemies for each Unplayable card in your draw pile. Put all Unplayable cards from your draw pile into your discard pile.

cards.name: Risky Strike
cards.description: Deal 18 damage. Add 2 Wounds on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Risky Strike+
cards.description: Deal 23 damage. Add 2 Wounds on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Snek Eyes
cards.description:
Fetch 2 cards from your draw pile and randomize their costs.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Snek Eyes+
cards.description:
Fetch 3 cards from your draw pile and randomize their costs.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Snek Oil
cards.description:
The next card you play applies 2 Poison and 1 Vulnerable whenever it deals unblocked attack damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Snek Oil+
cards.description:
The next card you play applies 3 Poison and 1 Vulnerable whenever it deals unblocked attack damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Twilight Tone
cards.description:
While this card is in your discard pile, deal double attack damage but you can only play attacks.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Twilight Tone+
cards.description:
Retain.
While this card is in your discard pile, deal double damage, but you can only play attacks.

cards.name: Whiff of Magic
cards.description:
Become theextravagant:Hexxed.
Until next turn, whenever a card Exhausts, heal 2 HP and gain 2 Temporary_HP.

cards.name: Whiff of Magic+
cards.description:
Become theextravagant:Hexxed.
Until next turn, whenever a card Exhausts, heal 3 HP and gain 3 Temporary_HP.

relics.name: Translucent Feather
relics.description: At the start of each combat Fetch 1 card from your draw pile.

relics.name: Pocket Dynamo
relics.description: If your hand is empty at the end of your turn, add 1 theextravagant:Accumulation to your hand.
relics.flavorText: If you spin it enough, a small light flickers.

relics.name: Red Phonoblaster
relics.description: Whenever you gain Strength, gain 1 additional Strength and lose 1 Strength at the end of your turn.

relics.name: Sorbet
relics.description: Extravagance is now conserved between turns.
relics.flavorText: Like Ice cream, but made for fancy people.

relics.name: Transcended Feather
relics.description: Replaces Translucent Feather. At the start of each combat add 2 theextravagant:Invocations to your hand.

relics.name: Molten Lipstick
relics.description: Whenever you play a card that costs 0 [E], deal 10 damage to a random enemy and add an upgraded Burn on top of your draw pile.
